Tilda Education
  • Courses
  • Guides & Articles
  • Video Tutorials
  • Success Stories

Tilda Education

Online learning resource from Tilda website builder. Practical guides to web design and digital marketing.
How to Build a Landing Page
Free coursebook on how to design, set up, and run high-conversion landing pages
Web Animation Course
Practical guide to web animation with examples, techniques, and tips on how to use them
Digital Marketing Course
Easy-to-understand course on promoting websites using SEO, social media, ads, and more

Guides & Articles

Learn how to create beautiful websites without web design or programming experience, and promote your projects online

How To Improve Your Website Conversions Using Marketing Quizzes
A guide to creating effective and engaging marketing quizzes to convert website visitors into leads
How To Build Your First Landing Page & Keep Balance Between Content And Design
An expert guide to building your first landing page, covering everything from structure to template selection
Figma Guide For Beginners
A step-by-step guide for Figma beginners covering all the basics to get started
How To Advertise On Instagram: A Step-by-Step Beginner's Guide
From creating a business profile to running ads using Instagram app and Facebook Ads Manager
Why Every Website Needs a 404 Page
Effective techniques for creating a custom error page and the best examples from Tilda and web
40+ Must-Have Figma Plugins For Designers In 2025
Popular Figma plugins to speed up and simplify your web design process
How To Create an Online Store
A step-by-step guide to building an eCommerce website from scratch
10 Web Design Trends 2025
Key design solutions & visual techniques to watch in 2025
28 Must-See Documentaries For Designers
Check out 28 documentaries on the art of design, related to different disciplines—from graphic to industrial design
A Guide For Non-Designers: How To Create A Good Presentation
Tips on creating beautiful and effective presentations, presentation tools and software, common mistakes to avoid
Guide To Getting Started As a Freelance Web Designer
Dreaming about a career in web design? Find out the essentials you need to kick-start your freelance web designer career from building a stellar portfolio to getting your first clients.
A Personal Brand Website: How To Use Tilda To Develop Your Personal Brand
A guide for solopreneurs and professionals who need self-promotion to find clients and get orders
Tilda Website Builder Overview, Reviews, Website Examples
Tilda Overview: Tilda is a website builder that helps you create websites, landing pages, portfiolios, and online stores. Discover Tilda's features, payment plans, user reviews, and website examples
Social Media Image Size Guide 2024
Image size guidelines for social media platforms: Facebook, X, Instagram, YouTube, Pinterest, and LinkedIn
17 Tips To Prepare Your Online Store For Holiday Sales 2024
How to prepare for Black Friday and Cyber Monday in 2024, retain customers, and summarize the results
Jobs To Be Done: How To Attract New Customers
An innovative framework for defining your customers' needs
Creating a Unique Selling Proposition (USP) For a Website
How to write an offer that engages your visitors in less than 10 seconds
Email Marketing: How To Launch Your Newsletter Сampaign
How to build email list and write your newsletter in a way that it won't end up in the spam folder
How To Write Landing Page Copy That Converts
A few simple tips on what and how to write for a landing page to increase conversions
How To Boost Your Tilda Website SEO Ranking
A step-by-step guide to making your Tilda website search engine friendly and rank high on Google
How To Make a Website. Step-by-Step Guide
5 steps to create a website, main features of Tilda, links to useful resources, and practical advice
10 Rules Of Digital Storytelling
Tilda founder Nikita Obukhov on how to tell stories digitally
New Profession: Designer On Tilda
What's changing in the design industry, and why it's a good idea to make websites for clients on Tilda
How To Improve Your Website Navigation
Practical tips for creating a user-friendly website on Tilda: clear and simple navigation bar, menu, navigation buttons, and more
Common Web Design Mistakes
Simple layout and design tips to help you create a stunning web page
A Complete Guide To Zero Block
How to create unique designs using Tilda's built-in Zero Block web design editor
How To Create a Cover for a Website
Practical tips from art director and Tilda founder Nikita Obukhov. Learn how avoid common mistakes and nicely arrange text and images
How To Choose Fonts For a Website Or an Article
Guidelines that help you choose a font without going into too much theory
How You Can Use UTM Tags
Discover how to work with UTM tags to analyze traffic sources on the website

Video Tutorials

Learn to create all types of websites on Tilda: Landing pages, online stores, multi-page websites, blogs, and more
How To Make a Landing Page
A step-by-step tutorial guiding you all the way from signing up for Tilda to publishing your one-page website.
How To Build an Online Store
You'll learn how to create an online store, add a cart, product catalog, and set up online payments.
How To Create a Multi-Page Website
A step-by-step tutorial guiding you all the way from signing up for Tilda to publishing your multi-page website.
How To Design In Zero Block
Learn how to use a built-in Tilda web editor for professionals allowing you to create unique designs.
How To Build a Blog On Tilda
Learn how to create and schedule posts for a newsfeed using Feeds, manage a magazine or corporate media.
Getting Started With Tilda
Tilda essentials: you'll learn how to create pages, edit blocks, publish a website, and customize main settings.
Watch all tutorials

Success Stories

Entrepreneurs and designers share their stories about how they accomplish their professional and personal goals by creating websites on Tilda
Freelance Web Designer
How creating websites on Tilda allows Simon travel around the world
Educational Project For Women
Story of a startup that helps women grow their inner entrepreneurs

PR Agency
How London-based agency benefit from moving to Tilda

Marketing Consultant
Why to teach your clients how to make and edit websites
Discover more stories

Create effective well-designed websites on Tilda

It’s easy to get started with 550+ pre-designed blocks
Create a website
We use cookies to provide you with a better user experience. By continuing to use tilda.education, you consent to our Cookie Policy.

ease-in-out;height:3px;background-color:#000;}.t-menuburger span:nth-child(1){top:0px;}.t-menuburger span:nth-child(2),.t-menuburger span:nth-child(3){top:8px;}.t-menuburger
